metadata.title: CVE-2022-20568 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In (TBD) of (TBD), there is a possible way to corrupt kernel memory due toa use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-220738351References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
